page1.text: By my authority as a guardian of Hell's gates, I open a door between our worlds. Now come forward and appear before me. I command your summoning. It
worked. Ha ha ha ha! I can't believe it worked. So the words of that damned Wyrnt Lies... So now, let me have a look at you. Ha ha ha ha ha ha! Look
at you all disoriented, not knowing where you are. That's cute. Now let me do the introductions. My name is Cinder. You might know my name from
Legends. I'm a hellhound. Yeah, it means exactly what you think it means human. Welcome to Hell. The place where all sinners end up to get eternally
tortured for all the acts you've committed on Earth. And for your first time in Hell, you have the chance to meet the chief of the Guardians of
Hell's gates. We're making sure that no foolish living human comes to Hell and do whatever they want. The big boss really hates when unwanted guests
decide to come into his home. No, no, you're not dead. You're as alive as I am. Well, not really, but with time you'll understand. Well, like I said,
nothing alive should come to Hell. But let's just say that using my authority as the chief guardian of Hell's gates, I might have broken one or two
taboos to bring you here. I might have created a crack in your world and did a reverse summoning. Instead of a human summoning a demon, it was the
opposite. Isn't that funny? Why did I summon you to Hell? You'll learn soon. And now follow me and don't stray away. You might end up in a terrifying
situation. And if a demon takes notice of you, they might want to take you. We don't have living humans wandering around every day. Also, those are
chains of Hell, once from a Hellhound. Those are a little special.
